page.title: 01EDUCATION -SCHOOL- MEMOIRS.
page.content: ALEX...In our classroom we have got some photographs of when our class went to Stanley Head. It is an outdoor pursuits centre. We went for the day. ALIX...Last Christmas we made some decorations.We made christmas crackers and and presents and hung them in the corridor. We made Disney characters,Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck and three little ducks. The other classes made other characters. PAUL...Iliked it when the Smoke Busters came to our school.Smoking is bad for your health.We also went to see Pinocchio.I liked it especially when the audiences shouted out. I thought they made a "racket". JOHN....At school I spilt a whole jug of grey paint on my school jumper.I had to buy another myself because my Mum was very annoyed.
